author: .fjl
content: can we have a quick discussion about removing old engine API tests in hive?

author: .fjl
content: Since Geth does not support the merge anymore, it cannot pass these tests anymore (`engine-*`)

author: .fjl
content: all tests start by waiting for terminal total difficulty to be reached

author: .fjl
content: can we remove this and start the test chain at the merge?

author: marioevz
content: I think there was only one simulator that contains these types of tests?

author: marioevz
content: But yes, sounds reasonable to me
